2025-11-10

```python
n = 23104268256953913611061598587002932946315581107518327386707122301481789224190181976185068020180952009913888595157870009530785457526708072502652873266855698
e = 65537
c = 15293884182759969733513140290811420269496474807408781112310098682412912545065820845427398290164629689681308000320121309282858112218029636481157350489957751

factors = list(primefac.primefac(n))    
p, q = factors[0], factors[1]
phi = (q-1) * (p -1)
d = inverse(e, phi)
m = pow(c, d, n)
byte_length = (m.bit_length() + 7) // 8
message_bytes = m.to_bytes(byte_length, 'big')
message_text = message_bytes.decode('utf-8')

print("\nLa flag es", message_text)
```
